result.markdown: --- title: vlightr date: '2025-01-30' categories: ["package", "{vctrs}"] image: "vlightr_hex.png" smallimage: '' description: | Conditionally format vectors of any class in R using {cli} text formatting. {vlightr} makes interactive data explication easier, by allowing elements of vectors and dataframe columns to be found with ease. summary: | Conditionally format vectors of any class in R using {cli} text formatting. {vlightr} makes interactive data explication easier, by allowing elements of vectors and dataframe columns to be found with ease. --- ::: {.cell} ::: This is a sample post for the `{vlightr}` package.
